description.raw:
Workaround for https://bitbucket.org/osrf/srcsim/issues/218

This builds the team's docker image up to 5 times, sleeping more and more each time the build fails. Successfully built layers are in the docker cache, so rebuilding a teams image will only build the layer that failed onwards.

If the image fails to build cloudsim-sim is notified with `{"fc_docker_image:""}` and the script exits with return code 5. I assume cloudsim-sim and cloudsim-widgets will be modified in the future to display the failure to the user.
